section.title: p:os-env
section.para: The p:os-env step returns information about the operating system environment on which the processor is running.

note.title: Editorial Note
note.para: TBD: This is an almost direct port from EXProc. Details might still change.

section.para: The p:os-env step returns information about the operating system environment. It returns a c:result element containing zero or more c:env elements. Each c:env element has a name and a value attribute containing the name and value of an environment variable.
On systems which have no concept of an environment, this step returns an empty c:result element.
